name: Simple Ball: Extended Edition
description: Classic hardcore Arkanoid with interesting bonuses and advanced physics is back on personal computers with new graphics!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, Windows Vista, Windows 8.1,Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Atlhon 64, Pentium Dual-Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 GPU (Shader 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, Windows Vista, Windows 8.1,Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Athlon X2, Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
